name: maintenance, transmission network, electricity, high voltage direct current subsea cable | maintenance, transmission network, electricity, high voltage direct current subsea cable | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/27206/documentation

This dataset represents the maintenance of 1 km and year of an high voltage direct current subsea cable (450 kV, 2x790-mmÂ² copper conductors, mass-impregnated paper insulation, and steel and lead sheeting). Controlling of subsea cable is undertaken by marine vessel.;Literature value for whole network was divided by lifetime (30 a) and length of subsea cable (39800 km) to get yearly values per km.;;Source: Arvesen, A., Nes, R.N.; Huertas-Hernando, D, Hertwich, E.G. (2014): Life cycle assessment of an offshore grid interconnecting wind farms and customers across the North Sea. Int J Life Cycle Assess 19: 826-837. p.831, table 2 (export cables)

Controlling trip by marine vessel

Controlling trip by marine vessel
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.timeDescription: refers to publication date of literature sources
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The scope of the underlying literature source is Europe.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Maintenance is comprised of a controlling trip by a marine vessel
